title: Google\Cloud\Channel\V1\Entitlement
name: Entitlement
description:
An entitlement is a representation of a customer's ability to use a service.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.channel.v1.Entitlement

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. Resource name of an entitlement in the form: accounts/{account_id}/customers/{customer_id}/entitlements/{entitlement_id}.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The time at which the entitlement is created.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The time at which the entitlement is updated.

params.name: data.offer
params.description: Required. The offer resource name for which the entitlement is to be created. Takes the form: accounts/{account_id}/offers/{offer_id}.

params.name: data.commitment_settings
params.description: Commitment settings for a commitment-based Offer. Required for commitment based offers.

params.name: data.provisioning_state
params.description: Output only. Current provisioning state of the entitlement.

params.name: data.provisioned_service
params.description: Output only. Service provisioning details for the entitlement.

params.name: data.suspension_reasons
params.description: Output only. Enumerable of all current suspension reasons for an entitlement.

params.name: data.purchase_order_id
params.description: Optional. This purchase order (PO) information is for resellers to use for their company tracking usage. If a purchaseOrderId value is given, it appears in the API responses and shows up in the invoice. The property accepts up to 80 plain text characters.

params.name: data.trial_settings
params.description: Output only. Settings for trial offers.

params.name: data.association_info
params.description: Association information to other entitlements.

params.name: data.parameters
params.description: Extended entitlement parameters. When creating an entitlement, valid parameter names and values are defined in the [Offer.parameter_definitions][google.cloud.channel.v1.Offer.parameter_definitions]. The response may include the following output-only Parameters: - assigned_units: The number of licenses assigned to users. - max_units: The maximum assignable units for a flexible offer. - num_units: The total commitment for commitment-based offers.

methods.name: getParameters
methods.description:
Extended entitlement parameters. When creating an entitlement, valid parameter names and values are defined in the [Offer.parameter_definitions][google.cloud.channel.v1.Offer.parameter_definitions].

The response may include the following output-only Parameters:

  • assigned_units: The number of licenses assigned to users.
  • max_units: The maximum assignable units for a flexible offer.
  • num_units: The total commitment for commitment-based offers.
